name: StarDawgs
description:
Your In a ship fighting through endless waves of enemies to reach the other side . Throughout the game will you encounter different enemies being able to counter the enemies attacks with numerous power ups and weapon choices as you go through the level and move forward in your progress

Instructions:

Use WASD to move around

Q and E to roll

Z and X Thrust up and down

Up and Down arrow keys Pitch

Left and Right arrow keys Yaw

Use Left and Right click function to shoot
